title: China central bank's reverse repo rate cut to alleviate economy shock: adviser
text: China's cut to its reverse repo rate should alleviate the shock to the real economy from a virus outbreak and is a good move to stabilize expectations and restore financial market confidence, a central bank adviser said on Monday.

title: Asian shares drop, commodities sink on virus fears after Lunar New Year break
text: Asian shares stumbled on Monday, oil skidded and commodities on Chinese exchanges plunged on their first trading day after a long break on fears the coronavirus epidemic will hit demand in the world's second-largest economy

title: Oil extends decline on concerns about virus' impact on China demand
text: Oil prices extended declines on Monday, dragged down by worries about lower demand in the world's largest oil importer China following the coronavirus breakout.

title: Chinese markets plummet almost 9% amid virus fears on first trading day after Lunar New Year holiday
text: The Shanghai composite dropped 8.6% in early trade. The Shenzhen component also plunged 9.03% in the opening minutes.

title: Investors brace for ugly start to post-holiday trade in China
text: Investors are bracing for a potential plunge in Chinese markets on Monday when onshore trade in stocks, bonds, yuan and commodities resumes following the Lunar New Year break and a steep global selldown on fears about the spread of a new virus.

title: Fed Chair Jerome Powell Should Not Be Partying With The Trumps
text: It should go without saying: Fed Chairman Jerome Powell should not be partying with Ivanka Trump and Jeff Bezos.

title: If coronavirus fears escalate, Wells Fargo warns 10-year Treasury yields could fall another 30%
text: Wells Fargo Securities' Michael Schumacher expects the bond rush to intensify.

title: The ‘Dogs Of The Dow’ Underperformed In January
text: The six “Dogs of the Dow” for 2020 had an aggregate decline of 4.2% in January versus a loss of just 1% for the overall Dow Jones Industrial average.

title: The Technical Secrets Of Stock Market Sentiment
text: Using the stock market sentiment readings for stock market timing is not as simple as some might suggest. Technician Tom Aspray explains the secrets of how he uses technical analysis to identify when you should act on extremes in sentiment.

title: Investor Beware: These 4 Economic Trends Could Cause a Market Crash in 2020
text: These dynamics could put an end to the market's record bull run.

title: Sentiment Speaks: Emerging Markets Look Sick
text: Emerging markets have begun to confirm a bearish perspective for 2020.

title: Coronavirus live updates: White House studying economic impact, France evacuates citizens
text: The number of confirmed cases of the coronavirus worldwide is nearly 14,380. The death toll has risen to at least 304.

title: Oil Prices Are Headed Much Lower
text: Crude oil prices are falling to much lower levels.

title: Don't Invest in These 2 Sectors in 2020 If You Think History Repeats Itself
text: The S&P 500 tends to perform pretty well in presidential election years. But not these two sectors.

title: Stocks This Week: The Equity Indices Will Likely Move Lower
text: The stock market is headed much lower.

title: Weighing The Week Ahead: Coronavirus - Analysis Or Paralysis?
text: It is a big week for economic data, including the ISM reports and the employment numbers.  It is another big week for earnings.
